title: Generalizing the Wythoff Array and other Fibonacci Facts to Tribonacci Numbers. (arXiv:2211.01410v1 [math.NT])
description: In this paper, we generalize a lot of facts from John Conway and Alex Ryba's paper, \textit{The extra Fibonacci series and the Empire State Building}, where we replace the Fibonacci sequence with the Tribonacci sequence. We study the Tribonacci array, which we also call \textit{the Trithoff array} to emphasize the connection to the Wythoff array. We describe 13 new sequences.
dc:creator: Eric Chen, Adam Ge, Andrew Kalashnikov, Tanya Khovanova, Ella Kim, Evin Liang, Mira Lubashev, Matthew Qian, Rohith Raghavan, Benjamin Taycher, Samuel Wang
